item.title: Remove a person from an user Dynamics 365 Finance Operations
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Max Nguyen)
item.description: Whenever you add a new person to an user in the user SysUserInfoPage form, the person field grays out. userinfo To remove the person from that user: In the user form System administration > Users > Users, go to Maintain versions. Delete the person.
